parameters.name: Id
parameters.description:
The unique identifier ID of the OSS storage object.

> Call the [DescribeOssObjects](~~410152~~) interface to get the ID.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
Sets the language type for request and response messages. The default value is **zh_cn**. Values:

- **zh_cn**: Simplified Chinese
- **en_us**: English (US)

parameters.name: ObjectKey
parameters.description: The full file name of the file stored on OSS.

parameters.name: ServiceRegionId
parameters.description: Service region ID, i.e., the region ID where the Bucket is located.

parameters.name: TemplateId
parameters.description:
Industry template ID.
> You can obtain the industry template ID by calling the [DescribeCategoryTemplateList](~~2399296~~) interface.
